title: Welcome to Task Management
content: This view is an end-to-end project plan: dependencies define a layered flow from Start → Work → End.

title: Project Start
content: The Start milestone anchors tasks with no prerequisites (Layer 1).

title: Layering from Dependencies
content: Each task’s layer is computed from dependency depth. Higher layers depend on earlier ones.

title: Critical Tasks
content: Critical tasks are colored by priority. Open one to see prerequisites.

title: Dependency Edges
content: Dashed links show dependency types (e.g., FS). Follow arrows from prerequisites → dependent tasks.

title: Project End
content: Terminal tasks (no dependents) flow into the End milestone.

title: Search & Compare
content: Use the Menu to search tasks (by name) and compare this structure with TaskDB roadmaps.
